    BeagleBone Class (PyCubed)

    Quick Details

    Property Value
    Class BeagleBone
    Namespace artemis
    File beaglebone.py

    Overview

    The BeagleBone class is used by the PyCubed flight software to communicate with the BeagleBone OBC. It provides message parsers to implement one half of the PyCubed Communication Protocol. Custom messages can be implemented by adding message handlers or parsers.

    Message Parsers and Handlers

    Parsers

    A message parser in this class refers to a function that deals directly with the CircuitPython UART object to read information from the BeagleBone. This is useful for cases where it is necessary to send and receive binary data. The expected signature of a message parser is shown below:

    def my_parser(uart, beaglebone)

    Where uart is the CircuitPython UART object, and beaglebone is the BeagleBone object calling the parser.

    Handlers

    A message handler in this class refers to a function that receives an array of string arguments parsed from a typical message. The expected signature of a message handler is shown below:

    def my_parser(args, beaglebone)

    Where args an array containing the automatically-parsed message arguments, and beaglebone is the BeagleBone object calling the parser.

    Functions

    Constructor

    Declaration: 
    def __init__(self, tx_pin, rx_pin)


    Constructs a new BeagleBone object operating on the given TX and RX pins. Adds default message parsers and handlers.

    Wait for Startup

    Declaration: 
    def wait_for_startup(self)


    Blocks execution until the BeagleBone sends the start up signal.

    Add Message Handler

    Declaration: 
    def add_message_handler(self, name, callback, num_args)


    Adds a new message handler with the given name, handler function, and number of arguments required.

    Add Message Parser

    Declaration: 
    def add_message_parser(self, name, callback):


    Adds a new message parser with the given name and parser function.

    Send Message

    Declaration: 
    def send_message(self, message_type_str, arguments)


    Sends a message to the BeagleBone with the given message type and arguments. The arguments parameter should be an array of strings.

    Shutdown BeagleBone

    Declaration: 
    def shutdown(self)


    Sends the shutdown signal to the BeagleBone.

    Properties

    UART Object

    Name: uart

    A CircuitPython UART object used to communicate with the BeagleBone.

    Startup Flag

    Name: startup_flag

    A boolean flag indicating whether the startup signal has been received.

    Handoff Flag

    Name: handoff_flag

    A boolean flag indicating whether the handoff signal has been received.

    Startup Flag

    Name: kill_radio_flag

    A boolean flag indicating whether the "kill radio" signal has been received.
